### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#13676](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13676.html) (Explain that mempool memory is added to -db
Concept ACK it is good to be consistent with units.
Should do the same for prune? https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=550MB&type=
@MarcoFalke \nThank you for your review. Your comment has been addressed.
@laanwj \nThank you for your review. Your comment has been addressed.
Needs a commit squash... otherwise utACK
I'd propose put this in `guiconstants.h` instead, there is no reason `optionsdialog.cpp` should depend on `intro.h`
Why is the `LL` suffix no longer needed here? Due to the new initialization style?

> Due to the new initialization style?

Yes. [list initialization (since C++11)](https://en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/language/list_initialization):
> Narrowing conversions
> 
> **list-initialization** limits the allowed implicit conversions by prohibiting ... conversion from integer ... to integer type that cannot represent all values of the original, except where source is a constant expr
